name: Clownin' Around -AET Design and Interactivity Final
name_original: Clownin' Around -AET Design and Interactivity Final
description: Highly-qualified, punctual, yet clumsy engineer, Quinn, HATES clowns and circuses! Boscoz Labs gets commissioned by a circus ringleader to create a portable funhouse with obstacles; knowing Quinn is the right man for this job, Boscoz Labs assigns this job to him. This doesn’t upset Quinn however, since it’s a dollhouse, a miniature structure he doesn’t have to fully-interact with. After he’s done with the project, he makes his way to Jerry’s Shrink-Ray, to adjust some minor obstacles and details. But disaster strikes! Quinn accidentally slips, knocking over the ray, shrinking himself, and what are the odds? Landing inside the funhouse! Quinn is TERRIFIED, afraid of his own creation, but there’s a reason why he's the best-of-the-best here in Boscoz Labs: Quinn has never turned in a project late, NEVER, and this won’t be the first time! Now it’s up to Quinn to get over his reasonable fear of clowns and anything circus related by going through this funhouse to fix his little situation.
